item.title: O'Reilly Book Covers
item.author: prma.dev@protonmail.com (Perma)
item.description: There is a retired burned out offended wild life photographer out there responsible for the O’Reilly’s book covers, after they were told “Your a photographer, that’s the same thing as graphic designer, give us 500 book covers, here is $1.”
